com.emeryferrari.jse3d.obj

Class Object3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emeryferrari.jse3d.obj.Object3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Object3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a collection of Vector3s.
    Since:
    1.0 beta
    Author:
    Alyx Ferrari
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Object3D

        public Object3D(Vector3[] points,
                Face[] faces,
                Line[] edges)
        Constructs an Object3D with the specified points, Faces, and Lines.
        Parameters:
        points - An array of points in the form of Vector3s.
        faces - An array of Faces to be rendered.
        edges - An array of Lines to be rendered.

        edges - An array of Lines to be rendered.
        faces - An array of Faces to be rendered.

    • Method Detail

      • movePosRel

        public Object3D movePosRel(Vector3 diff,
                           Display display)
        Moves this Object3D and its points relative to its current position.
        Parameters:
        diff - Relative point to which this Object3D should be moved.
        display - Display object being used to render this Object3D.
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • movePosRel

        public Object3D movePosRel(Vector3 diff,
                           Vector3 camPos)
        Moves this Object3D and its points relative to its current position.
        Parameters:
        diff - Relative point to which this Object3D should be moved.
        camPos - Position of the camera (result of Display.getCameraPosition(), not Display.getCameraPositionActual()).
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • movePosRel

        public Object3D movePosRel(double xDiff,
                           double yDiff,
                           double zDiff,
                           Display display)
        Moves this Object3D and its points relative to its current position.
        Parameters:
        xDiff - Relative X coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        yDiff - Relative Y coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        zDiff - Relative Z coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        display - Display object being used to render this Object3D.
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • transitionPosRel

        public Object3D transitionPosRel(double xDiff,
                                 double yDiff,
                                 double zDiff,
                                 int millis,
                                 Display display)
        Transitions this Object3D and its points relative to its current position over a specified number of milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        xDiff - Relative X coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        yDiff - Relative Y coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        zDiff - Relative Z coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        millis - Milliseconds it should take to transition this Object3D.
        display - Display object being used to render this Object3D.
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • movePosRel

        public Object3D movePosRel(double xDiff,
                           double yDiff,
                           double zDiff,
                           Vector3 camPos)
        Moves this Object3D and its points relative to its current position.
        Parameters:
        xDiff - Relative X coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        yDiff - Relative Y coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        zDiff - Relative Z coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        camPos - Position of the camera (result of Display.getCameraPosition(), not Display.getCameraPositionActual()).
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • transitionPosRel

        public Object3D transitionPosRel(Vector3 diff,
                                 int millis,
                                 Vector3 camPos,
                                 int physicsTimestep)
        Transitions this Object3D and its points relative to its current position over a specified number of milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        diff - Relative point to which this Object3D should be moved.
        millis - Milliseconds it should take to transition this Object3D.
        camPos - Position of the camera (result of Display.getCameraPosition(), not Display.getCameraPositionActual()).
        physicsTimestep - The physics timestep to use to transition this Object3D (if the global physics timestep is undesired).
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • transitionPosRel

        public Object3D transitionPosRel(Vector3 diff,
                                 Vector3 camPos,
                                 int millis,
                                 int physicsTimestep)
        Transitions this Object3D and its points relative to its current position over a specified number of milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        diff - Relative point to which this Object3D should be moved.
        camPos - Position of the camera (result of Display.getCameraPosition(), not Display.getCameraPositionActual()).
        millis - Milliseconds it should take to transition this Object3D.
        physicsTimestep - The physics timestep to use to transition this Object3D (if the global physics timestep is undesired).
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • transitionPosRel

        public Object3D transitionPosRel(Vector3 diff,
                                 int millis,
                                 Display display)
        Transitions this Object3D and its points relative to its current position over a specified number of milliseconds.

        millis - Milliseconds it should take to transition this Object3D.
        display - Display object being used to render this Object3D.

      • transitionPosRel

        public Object3D transitionPosRel(Vector3 diff,
                                 Display display,
                                 int millis)
        Transitions this Object3D and its points relative to its current position over a specified number of milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        diff - Relative point to which this Object3D should be moved.
        display - Display object being used to render this Object3D.
        millis - Milliseconds it should take to transition this Object3D.
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • transitionPosRel

        public Object3D transitionPosRel(double xDiff,
                                 double yDiff,
                                 double zDiff,
                                 int millis,
                                 Vector3 camPos,
                                 int physicsTimestep)
        Transitions this Object3D and its points relative to its current position over a specified number of milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        xDiff - Relative X coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        yDiff - Relative Y coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        zDiff - Relative Z coordinate to which this Object3D should be moved.
        millis - Milliseconds it should take to transition this Object3D.
        camPos - Position of the camera (result of Display.getCameraPosition(), not Display.getCameraPositionActual()).
        physicsTimestep - The physics timestep to use to transition this Object3D (if the global physics timestep is undesired).
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • scale

        public Object3D scale(double multiplierX,
                      double multiplierY,
                      double multiplierZ,
                      Vector3 around,
                      Display display)
        Scales this Object3D and its points with a specified point as the center.
        Parameters:
        multiplierX - X multiplier.
        multiplierY - Y multiplier.
        multiplierZ - Z multiplier.
        around - Point around which to scale this Object3D.
        display - Display object being used to render this Object3D.
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • scale

        public Object3D scale(double multiplierX,
                      double multiplierY,
                      double multiplierZ,
                      Vector3 around,
                      Vector3 camPos)
        Scales this Object3D and its points with a specified point as the center.
        Parameters:
        multiplierX - X multiplier.
        multiplierY - Y multiplier.
        multiplierZ - Z multiplier.
        around - Point around which to scale this Object3D.
        camPos - Position of the camera (result of Display.getCameraPosition(), not Display.getCameraPositionActual()).
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • getPointID

        public int getPointID(Vector3 point)
        Returns the Object3D-specific point ID of a point given its position.
        Parameters:
        point - The position of the point for which to search.
        Returns:
        The point ID of the specified point, -1 if it couldn't be found.

      • setScript

        public Object3D setScript(Updatable updatable)
        Sets this Object3D's script.
        Parameters:
        updatable -
        Returns:
        The Object3D on which this method was called.

      • start

        public void start()
        Calls the start() method of this Object3D's script. Do not call this method unless you know what you're doing.

      • update

        public void update()
        Calls the update() method of this Object3D's script. Do not call this method unless you know what you're doing.

      • fixedUpdate

        public void fixedUpdate()
        Calls the fixedUpdate() method of this Object3D's script. Do not call this method unless you know what you're doing.
